statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 8 \\ 0 \\ -8 \\ 10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -14 \\ -14 \\ 3 \\ -27 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
